mapper.insert: insert into question(title, description, gmt_create, gmt_modified, creator, tag) values (#{title}, #{description}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified}, #{creator}, #{tag})
mapper.select: select * from question where creator=#{userId} limit #{offset}, #{size}
select count(1) from question where creator=#{userId}
mapper.update: update question set view_count = view_count + 1 where id=#{id}
update question set COMMENT_COUNT = COMMENT_COUNT + #{commentCount, jdbcType=INTEGER} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from QUESTION where id != #{id} and tag regexp #{tag}
